name: Tiny arcade 1 - The retro reloader pyramid
name_original: Tiny arcade 1 - The retro reloader pyramid
description:
The winner of the Retro Remakes 2006 competition, The Pyramid is a remake of the ancient Spectrum game of the same name. An action adventure game, you play the part of Ziggy. Your aim is to battle legions of retro arcade enemies to gain crystals that can unlock the doors of chambers within the gaming pyramid, so that you can find the ancient arcade. Retro reloader tweak by returnlearn.com with permission from Pug Fugly games. Sequel to include an arcade where you battle against computer viruses..

 Download
Features 
4 difficulty levels to suit all gamers (Working on extra-hard next)
*Working on 2-player feature
Can be played with keyboard, joystick,mouse & single switch
120 levels containing over 140 types of enemies 
Original Soundtrack 
High quality graphics and animation
